name: PRESSURE TRANSDUCERS
description:
## PACKING
- ……… pc/inner box
- ……… inner box/Carton

## LOADING CAPACITY
- 20GP (29m3): …….. 
- 40HC (69m3): …….. 

## AVAILABLE CONNECTORS
- Edward connector
- Abbott connector
- BD connector
- Medex connector
- Philips connector
- USB connector
- PVB connector
- Utah connector
- Mindray connector

## STRENGTHS
- Sensitive chip, accurate data transfer
- Match all kinds of cables

## CATHETER PLACEMENT
- Closed system design reduces the risk of infection of operators
- Accurate substantial design helps to avoid risk of leaking
- Needle free blood sample collecting system helps to avoid stabbing and cross infection

## APPLICATION
- Central venous pressure and other various physiological pressure monitoring
- Blood sampling
- Neonatus pressure monitoring

## CONVENIENT OPERATION
- Simple operation and accurate flow rate control
- Various Connectors for choice, can be used with different monitors
- Micro constant flow (2~5cc/25~35cc per hour) helps to guarantee the continuous flow
